message:
Correctness_Score: 1.0
Style_Score: 0.6
Simplicity_Score: 1.0
Robustness_Score: 0.8
Reasoning: The solution correctly groups the 7N integers into N weeks, sums each week, and prints the results in the required format, so it will pass all valid test cases per the problem specification. Style is minimal — variable names are reasonable but there are no comments or docstrings to aid readers, so I rated it as fair. Simplicity is excellent: the implementation is concise and efficient, using slicing and sum without unnecessary work. Robustness is good but not perfect: it assumes the 7N integers appear on the second input line (as specified) and lacks input validation or modular structure, slightly reducing maintainability.
